about_the_game:
Join Our Discord

About Just Another MMO

All early access players will get a Supporter Pack as a reward for playing and helping the game grow. Every character created will get the Supporter Pack automatically added to your inventory in game. You will get to keep your characters and items when the game transitions into full release.
Supporter Pack Includes:
Exclusive Wings
EXP Ring
Quick Start Refine Kit

Feautes:
  • 100+ Items Per Class
  • Each item has unique stats to allow you to customize your build
  • 4 Character Classes
  • Party with friends to level up together
  • Guild up and dominate the guild war on Saturdays
  • Grind dungeons to get loot to progress further and fight Bosses.
  • Planned features such as player houses, auctions, player owned shops

JAMMO is a MMORPG dungeon crawler game where the goal is to grind dungeons to find loot, upgrade your items, and dominate during the Guild War event. May the strong put up a fight, but the strongest take home the title.

*This is a early access indie developer game. The game is currently under development and is being updated regularly. It is not a finished product. We hope you can play and grow with us as we add more content and continuously balance the game out to better improve your experience. Please join our for more information, updates, help, support, and friends. The community feedback is what will help shape the game.
detailed_description:
Join Our Discord

About Just Another MMO

All early access players will get a Supporter Pack as a reward for playing and helping the game grow. Every character created will get the Supporter Pack automatically added to your inventory in game. You will get to keep your characters and items when the game transitions into full release.
Supporter Pack Includes:
Exclusive Wings
EXP Ring
Quick Start Refine Kit

Feautes:
  • 100+ Items Per Class
  • Each item has unique stats to allow you to customize your build
  • 4 Character Classes
  • Party with friends to level up together
  • Guild up and dominate the guild war on Saturdays
  • Grind dungeons to get loot to progress further and fight Bosses.
  • Planned features such as player houses, auctions, player owned shops

JAMMO is a MMORPG dungeon crawler game where the goal is to grind dungeons to find loot, upgrade your items, and dominate during the Guild War event. May the strong put up a fight, but the strongest take home the title.

*This is a early access indie developer game. The game is currently under development and is being updated regularly. It is not a finished product. We hope you can play and grow with us as we add more content and continuously balance the game out to better improve your experience. Please join our for more information, updates, help, support, and friends. The community feedback is what will help shape the game.
name: JAMMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-Bit
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-Bit
  • Processor: 3GHz
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 450 MB available space

short_description: JAMMO is a MMORPG dungeon crawler game where the goal is to grind dungeons to find loot, upgrade your items, and dominate during the Guild War event. May the strong put up a fight, but the strongest take home the title.
